content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need someone to check out my sink, it's leaking again.
I can help you with that! May I have your name to get started with booking the plumbing service?
Great, thank you Brian. Could you please provide your address so I can check if you're in our service area?
Thank you! Let me check if 900 Oakwood Lane is within our service area.
reason: Unable to determine if customer address is in the service area. Human help needed.

content: Hi Brian, this is Judy from XYZ. Sorry for the tech delay! You are definitely in our service area. Let me know what time works best for your plumbing appointment and I'll get you scheduled ASAP.
Thank you Judy. Tomorrow afternoon would be great if possible.
You're all set for tomorrow afternoon! Our plumber will call before arriving. If you need any more help, just reply here. Have a great day!
reason: Appointment booked by operator after agent escalation.
